subject: Simsonn Order Confirmation #SSN2310
description_text: Hello, the Plus X P3-H3 / Silver / Baseplate you purchased is currently out of stock in our US warehouse. Due to recent delays in customs clearance in the US, shipments are experiencing delays, and we expect the warehouse to receive the goods next week. We can replace it with the Plus X P3-H3 / Black / Baseplate and ship it immediately from the US warehouse, or you can wait for the silver version to arrive. We can also ship the silver version you purchased from China, but customs clearance may also be very slow. Please let me know your preference.

conversations.body_text:
Hello, that is unfortunate to hear the silver baseplate is out of stock. I will go ahead and choose to take the black baseplate to be shipped ASAP. Is it possible to ship the black baseplate on a priority shipment?
    Thankjs

Hi Mxryan,    Okay, thank you for your confirmation. We have already shipped the black version of the pedal set for you. Here is your logistics tracking link:    https://www.fedex.com/fedextrack/no-results-found?trknbr=883587822890
